successes.title: Magnic Light iC - Intelligent Contactless Bicycle Dynamo
successes.description: The worlds first contactless bicycle generator without extra components on the wheels. Now with steady bicycle light & intelligent software-controlled brake light.

Pledges.description: Thanks! Email" with many pictures and the story from the beginning of the project until now. This reward is included in all other rewards.
Very Early Bird - Magnic Light iC Complete Set: Get two front lights + 1 rear light  (incl. adapters).
"Thank You Postcard" signed personally by me.
Magnic Light magnetic paper knife logo: Get a magnetic Magnic Light Logo (10x7cm) made of stainless steel. Perfect for opening letters / easily to attach at metal surface
Magnic Light Shirt: Get a personalized high quality functional shirt with the project logo and your name.(sizes between S and XL)
Magnic Light iC rearlight: Rearlight with steady light & intelligent control for efficient power (incl adapter).
Magnic Light iC frontlight: Frontlight with steady light & intelligent control for efficient power (incl. adapter).
Magnic Light iC frontlight: Frontlight with steady light & intelligent control for efficient power (incl. adapter).
Magnic Light iC rearlight: Rearlight with steady light & intelligent control for efficient power (incl adapter).
